title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: From Kingsburgh House the Prince Avent to Portree, changing hisclothes in a wood by the way. In the inn, at Portree he bade fareAvell tothe brave girl Avho had helped him so well.* When the time for partingcame, it is narrated, he could not speak for emotion, but stood silent,holding her hand in his.

title: A summer in Skye /
author: Smith, Alexander
snippet: to this conversation, urged the party to a trot. The pedestrians then struck across the hills, and reached Kingsburgh House about eleven o'clock, the equestrians arriving soon after.

title: A Summer in Skye
author: Smith, Alexander
snippet: Kingsburgh then opened out his plan, with which theprince expressed himself satisfied. After Charleshad partaken of some refreshment, they bothstarted towards Kingsburgh House.
